description: A State Department spokeswoman, Elizabeth Trudeau, confirmed that two American citizens, Sean Copeland and his son Brodie, 11, were killed in the attack in Nice.
title: State Department Confirms U.S. Victims
title_page: State Department Confirms U.S. Victims - Video - NYTimes.com
text: A State Department spokeswoman, Elizabeth Trudeau, confirmed that two American citizens, Sean Copeland and his son Brodie, 11, were killed in the attack in Nice.
